ðŸ“– Summary: SQLGlot is a Python library for parsing, transpiling, optimizing, and formatting SQL queries. It supports conversion between 24 different SQL dialects and provides features for syntax error detection, custom dialect support, and abstract syntax tree (AST) analysis and manipulation. It enables developers to work with SQL queries in a dialect-agnostic way.
